message: Hello! I have a fantastic product for you today. It's a rare find, and I'm confident you'll be very happy with it. The price is $10000, non-negotiable.  It's a one-time opportunity to own something special. What do you say?
Alice, your description is very enticing. Since there's no history yet, I'm willing to take a chance on this product. I'll buy it!
